sentences.en: Are you sure you can fend off that assault?
sentences.cn: 你确信你能对付得了他们的反击?

sentences.en: Cattle left outdoors to fend for themselves thrived on this God - given hay.
sentences.cn: 在户外放养靠自己觅食的牛群,就靠吃这种天赐的干草而繁衍.

sentences.en: He had struggled to pay off creditors but couldn't fend them off any longer.
sentences.cn: 他曾想方设法还债主的钱，但却再也躲不过他们了。

sentences.en: He raised his arm up to fend branches from his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他举手将树枝从他眼前档开.

sentences.en: He raised his hand to fend off the blow.
sentences.cn: 他抬起手来抵挡那一拳。

sentences.en: I had to keep from being crushed, to fend off continuous attack.
sentences.cn: 我必须不让自己被压服和提防连续不断的攻击.

sentences.en: I've had to fend for myself since I was 14.
sentences.cn: 我从十四岁时起就不得不照料自己.

sentences.en: In future he will have to fend for himself.
sentences.cn: 从今以后他得自己谋生了.

sentences.en: Kim put up his hand, as if to fend off his friend.
sentences.cn: 金姆举起手, 似乎是要挡开他的朋友.

sentences.en: Most animals let their young fend for themselves from an early age.
sentences.cn: 大多数动物让他们的幼仔从小就独立生活.

sentences.en: Protection of the vital oil fields remained a unifying goal, and the United States viewed a more capable Saudi military, one able to fend off regional and domestic threats, as key to attaining it.
sentences.cn: 保护重要石油地区的安全是两国统一的目标，而美军认为一个能够抵御地区和国内威胁的更加强大的沙特军队，是实现这一目标的关键。

sentences.en: She has two children to fend for.
She raised her arm up to fend branches from her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她抬起胳膊将树枝从她眼前挡开。

sentences.en: Simulated life is a theory of biology left to fend for itself.
sentences.cn: 模拟生命就是自己照料自己的生物学理论.

sentences.en: The kids had to fend for themselves while their parents were away.
sentences.cn: 父母不在家时，孩子们只好自己照料自己。

sentences.en: They tried to fend off the questions raised by the newsman.
sentences.cn: 他们试图回避新闻记者的问题.

sentences.en: To fend off would - be robbers?
sentences.cn: 为了 防 贼 吗 ?

sentences.en: You have to learn to fend for yourself.

words.tran_cn: （汽车等的）挡泥板；防卫物；（暖炉的）炉围；（船只的）碰垫

trans.tran_cn: 谋生，防御，保护，供养，闪避，挡开
